WorkItem.ClosedComment: Not really an issue, unless the calculations are demonstrated to be faulty.
WorkItem.Description:
The algorithm that calculates Moonkin DPS has been changed recently.
 
Rawr 2.3.18 estimates my Moonkin cycle at 8184 DPS.  Rawr 2.3.19 calculates a number of 8853 DPS.
 
My character's XML file is included with this post.  I don't know which number to believe as I've seen myself pull 8.9K in ICC-10 trash but only 6K-7K on bosses.
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Estimation of DPS vs 2.3.18 - Why so High

Comments.Message: He made some changes to the rotation code so that it doesn't break on some stuff. The new numbers should be more accurate.

Short version: releases prior to 2.3.18 vastly undervalued the 2T10 set bonus, as well as having an incorrect formula for calculating Starfall damage.  The new numbers should be considerably higher, and also more accurate if you're doing everything right.  Note that, since Moonkin is not currently capable of modeling casting interruptions/movement, it reflects "ideal" conditions, and so the number may be unrealistic on any given boss fight.
